TopicTitle: If you were the first person on mars, what would you say?

Articles.Content: "Ok ladies and gentlemen, if you would be so kind as to form a nice tidy line on the left, we will start the tour."
"And to your left, you can see our inflatable colony, which-" *WHUMP* "Just collapsed."
"Let's move on. If you look to your right, you can see Mark Watney Memorial Crater."
"Why can I hear a gyroscopic stabiliser going crazy, oh wait, one of the legs has snapped off, oh no than whine is getting serious, oh !@#$%^&*"
"A chewing gum? Here?"
"Houston, the Eagle has warped across spacetime successfully and landed."
"And now the goal of any great explorer. To be the first to drop litter in a pristine enviroment."
"Now, where are the aliens?"
"The Aliens have arrived."
Finally some peace and quiet.
"Wait... Did we make a backup?"
"Does our rocket have enough delta V for the return trip?"
"Hey, do we have enough delta V for the return trip?"  "Oh, I thought you said to bring plenty of Delta Goodrem!"
"What do you mean: 'Some parts are incompatible with RSS/RO, and will be removed' ?"
Please Ensure Your Helmets Remain Sealed at ALL Times.

Singing:

It is the mission of each true knight...
His duty... nay, his privilege!
To dream the impossible dream,
To fight the unbeatable foe,
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go;
To right the unrightable wrong.

To love, pure and chaste, from afar,
To try, when your arms are too weary,
To reach the unreachable star!

This is my Quest to follow that star,
No matter how hopeless, no matter how far,
To fight for the right
Without question or pause,
To be willing to march into hell
For a heavenly cause!

And I know, if I'll only be true
To this glorious Quest,
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest.

And the world will be better for this,
That one man, scorned and covered with scars,
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage,
To reach the unreachable stars!
"Guys, open your helmets for a minute, the glass flares are killing the photo."
"I wonder whatever happend to "The Last Person on Earth"?
"The view almost makes the one way trip worth it"
"The GPS claims that this is Abuquerque."

Reads again.
"Who is Abu Querque?"

"It is one small step for Dan, one giant leap for Dan kind."

"Who wants to live for Trevor?"

"Kevin is a place on Earth."
"Hey, Martians! and shut up! The revenge came from the Earth."
"There is no internet here, so who am I going to boast to? (Sigh) what is the point of this if there is no social media?"
"Who left this football ball here? What are the creatures with spherical feet?"
